Re-elect D.C. Attorney General Karl Racine

Karl Racine kicked off his reelection campaign this week. In 2014, the voters of the District of Columbia elected him as their first independent attorney general. It is now overwhelmingly clear they made the right choice. He is a lifelong District resident.
